H3.text: when was last time bayern munich won champions league. 2013

A4.text: The Champions League final was held at the Allianz Arena and Bayern reached the final in their home stadium but lost to Chelsea on penalties.

A5.text: Bayern have won six European Cup/UEFA Champions League titles, winning their sixth title in the 2020 final as part of the Treble.

A6.text: It was the German club's first UEFA Champions League title
